title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XIV, pt. 655 - Prohibited Conduct
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XIV, pt. 655 - Prohibited Conduct

State Regulations
§ 655.1 - Coasting on bridges with sleds, etc
§ 655.2 - Fishing, diving, jumping or mooring boats
§ 655.3 - Climbing on bridges
§ 655.4 - Entering toll booths, offices; loitering
§ 655.5 - Damaging commission property; liability therefor
§ 655.6 - Transport of explosives on bridges

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XIV, pt. 655

Statutory authority: New York L. 1927, ch. 321, art. IX; Vermont Acts of 1927, no. 139, art. IX
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
